tool_description: An API with departure, arrival, and flight data from Toronto Pearson International Airport.
name: Toronto Pearson Airport
title: Toronto Pearson Airport

api_list.name: Get Arrivals by Carousel Number
api_list.description: returns arriving flights for the given carousel number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://toronto-pearson-airport.p.rapidapi.com/arrivals/carousel/9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "toronto-pearson-airport.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://toronto-pearson-airport.p.rapidapi.com/arrivals/carousel/{carouselid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "toronto-pearson-airport.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Arrivals
api_list.description: This will return all of the days arrivals at Pearson airport.

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "toronto-pearson-airport.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
